text: Škoda 15Tr is an articulated trolleybus produced by Škoda Transportation from 1988 to 2004, since 1995 in modernised version 15TrM. It is longer version of Škoda 14Tr == Construction features == An electric motor is located in the rear of the bus. Inside are used leatherette or plastic Vogelsitze seats. Rear B and C axles are propulsed. On the right side of the bus are four doors. == Production and operation == Production of 15Tr started in 1988 and continued until 1995. 469 trolleybuses were produced and delivered to various cities in Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Iran, Latvia, Lithuania, Slovakia and Ukraine and United States which is built by ETI for San Francisco, California, US. Production of 15TrM started in 1995 and continued until 2004. 121 trolleybuses were produced and delivered to various cities in Czech Republic, Latvia and Slovakia. == References == == See also == Category:Buses manufactured in the Czech Republic Category:Trolleybuses Category:Škoda vehicles
title: Škoda 15Tr
